description: Without the power of the Earth Priestess, the El Search Party defeats Scar, but Ran completes the resurrection ritual of the Demon God after the battle. Before the god Sult is fully reborn, Elesis is possessed by the El Lady and seals the god away. The El Search Party, with their new goal of finding the El Lady, use the prophecies of the six Priestesses to reveal her location and begin their new adventure.
